channel.title: Gary Goodyear
channel.description: Recent news about Gary Goodyear, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com
item.description:
Minister Goodyear Visits Vaughan to Discuss Future Plans for Jobs, Growth and ...
5, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), along with Julian Fantino, Member of Parliament for Vaughan and Minister of Veterans Affairs, was in Vaughan today to meet with stakeholders about the role ... "I'm pleased to be here in Vaughan with my colleague MP Fantino to participate in a roundtable discussion to make certain we continue to create programs that help the businesses and workers in this community.

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com
item.description:
Minister Goodyear Visits Georgina to Discuss Future Plans for Jobs, Growth and ...
4, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), along with Peter Van Loan, Member of Parliament for York-Simcoe, was in the Toronto area today to discuss the role of FedDev Ontario in the region ... "I'm pleased to be here in York-Simcoe with my colleague MP Van Loan to participate in a roundtable discussion to make certain we continue to create programs that help the businesses and workers in this community.".

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Media Advisory: Minister Goodyear to Celebrate Community Infrastructure ...
3, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will tour the Creative Community Hub site at the former Sutton Public School, a project supported through the Community Infrastructure ... Peter VanLoan, Member of Parliament for York-Simcoe will join the Minister. Minister Goodyear and MP Van Loan will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event.
